SummaryEnglish: In a floating city, a young boy is framed for the death of his father and exiled. He ends up in a junkyard zone, and swears to return for revenge.

1.SummaryEnglish: Rudo vive nos becos de uma cidade flutuante, onde os pobres sobrevivem sob a sombra dos ricos, que levam uma vida luxuosa e simplesmente jogam seu lixo pela borda, no abismo. Um dia, ele é falsamente acusado de assassinato, e sua condenação injusta leva a um castigo inimaginável — o exílio para além da borda, junto com o restante do lixo. Na superfície, os dejetos da humanidade deram origem a monstros cruéis, e se Rudo quiser ter alguma esperança de descobrir a verdade e buscar vingança contra aqueles que o lançaram no inferno, ele terá de dominar um novo poder e se juntar a um grupo conhecido como os Limpadores, que enfrentam as monstruosidades de lixo do Fosso!
Bullied outcast Rudo finds respite in repurposing trash, until a terrible tragedy changes his life forever.

2.SummaryEnglish: Cast into the Pit, Rudo is saved by the mysterious Enjin who may not have his best interests at heart.

3.SummaryEnglish: Enjin teaches Rudo about life on the Ground, but an encounter with a churlish stranger may cut his time short.

4.SummaryEnglish: After being introduced to Cleaner HQ, Rudo follows Riyo on a job to learn the business.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Cleaners go on a job to save another Sphereite who survived the fall. Rudo tags along to learn more.

6.SummaryEnglish: With the job having gone terribly wrong, Rudo finds himself face to face with a merciless Raider named Jabber.

7.SummaryEnglish: Jabber employs a new strategy to get through Rudo's defenses, and another ally joins the fray.

8.SummaryEnglish: Rudo deals with the emotional aftermath of the Jabber fight and gets a new lead about returning to the Sphere.

9.SummaryEnglish: To get a "spell" for their next mission, the Cleaners head to Canvas Town, where they make a tragic discovery.

10.TitleEnglish: Penta: The Desert No Man's Land
10.SummaryEnglish: With their gear-up complete, the crew heads into the No Man's Land, Penta, to get clues about the Sphere.

11.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious woman living in the No Man's Land challenges the crew from an unexpected angle.

12.SummaryEnglish: Tamsy and Zanka fight to save their captive allies. In the aftermath, Rudo has an unexpected reaction.

13.SummaryEnglish: Amo tells the story of how she came to the tower and of the "angels" who came to visit her.
